title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Constructed a compendium of reusable UI components using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS; standardized frontend development practices, resulting in faster project turnarounds and consistent user interfaces.

Transformed UX designs into a functional, branded front-end portal on Salesforce Experience Cloud using modern web development practices; enhanced user experience and brand consistency across the platform.

Managed and mentored junior developers through pull request reviews, onboarding documentation, and detailed technical designs; improved code quality and accelerated the onboarding process for new team members.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led backend development for a Salesforce Experience Cloud website aimed at streamlining volunteer management; designed system architecture, page layouts, and user flows, resulting in a more efficient interaction between volunteers and managers.
Mentored junior developers and conducted knowledge sessions; elevated team skills and ensured best practices in development workflows.
Implemented a robust DevOps solution using Microsoft Azure; enhanced deployment speed and system reliability, streamlining the software development lifecycle.

title: Technical Consultant II
description: Led UI development for an employee-facing mobile app using Ionic and Angular, streamlining order tracking and boosting product search capabilities.

Lead Developer on an Angular Ionic app for client employees, mentored a junior developer, and increased Jasmine test code coverage to >90%; improved workplace safety through real-time hazard reporting features.
Managed backend maintenance for a Salesforce invoicing application, visualized complex Apex logic, and enhanced system stability; provided clearer insights for future teams and clients

Participated in a specialized UI/UX team, developing modular, reusable UI components for Salesforce Experience Cloud, maintained high Jest code coverage; expedited feature development for other teams while ensuring UI consistency.
Involved in numerous internal projects, developed and maintained several applications using Angular and React; increased productivity for internal employees.
